nodes.text: Ana Vitorrian was an attorney working for the Black Bha'lir. Raised in high society, Vitorrian attended the best schools, including the Imperial Academy. After serving as a legal assistant to the Imperial Senate, she opened her own law practice which specialized in prosecuting "enemies" of the Galactic Empire. After falling into an on-off relationship with the smuggler Thaddeus Ross, Vitorrian's views came to support the working man, even if those individuals broke the law to survive. Over time, Vitorrian was recruited by the Black Bha'lir to be their head defense attorney.
